basic.description: In fourth year, each student must submit a proposal for an individual program of creative exploration and research. This can be based on one or more of the following areas: painting, printmedia, 3-D media. Instruction at this level is through individual tutorials and critiques, although all students will meet once a week for a common seminar.
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Individual Programs I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 and (a GPA of 2.60 in ARTF337 and ARTF338) and (a grade of C- in ARTH120) and (a minimum of 6.0 units in ARTH at the 200-level) and a GPA of 1.90.
